text: hamane allaah par mithya aarop lagaaya hai, yadi tumhaare dharm mein isake pashchaat vaapas aa gaye, jabaki hamen allaah ne usase mukt kar diya hai aur hamaare lie sambhav nahin ki usamen phir aa jaayen, parantu ye ki hamaara paalanahaar chaahata ho. hamaara paalanahaar pratyek vastu ko apane gyaan mein samoye hue hai, allaah hee par hamaara bharosa hai. he hamaare paalanahaar! hamaare aur hamaaree jaati ke beech nyaay ke saath nirnay kar de aur too hee uttam nirnayakaaree hai
